results.content:
Un exemple concret de l'utilisation de vue.js qui permet de bien comment tout fonctionne sur un vrai projet.
Un peu rapide parfois.
Avantage supplémentaire, la durée reste plus que raisonnable.

results.content: Need also explane if you run into errors like if you need to set  Set ExecutionPolicy for window users.... build was not working even when I used the demo files?
results.content_html: Need also explane if you run into errors like if you need to set Set ExecutionPolicy for window users.... build was not working even when I used the demo files?

results.content:
I really liked the first part of the course where he walked us through designing a webpage in Adobe XD. Extra knowledge that I now find critical as a front-end developer. 

Only complaint is how fast he goes when writing the CSS, but that's not enough to remove any part of the 5 stars. 

P.S I've now finished the course, and would have loved a way to make this page Mobile friendly, otherwise it still earns its 5 stars.
results.content_html:
I really liked the first part of the course where he walked us through designing a webpage in Adobe XD. Extra knowledge that I now find critical as a front-end developer.

P.S I've now finished the course, and would have loved a way to make this page Mobile friendly, otherwise it still earns its 5 stars.
